logisim.changelog: * Compiled with Java 10 * Double click with Edit Tool to label a component * Finally added the Buzzer (I/O library)! Tell me if you have any problem with it * Graphics paint refresh rate was set at 20Hz, now is 60Hz by default and you can change it in Preferences/Window * Shift Register will show its internal bits even when set to serial load * A lot of bug fixes, optimizations and small changes
